short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Full screen HTML + Widget Editor + disabled line wraps for SparkPay Development.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SparkPay Zen 

This extension lets you expand SparkPay's HTML Editor to the full width of the screen along with disabling line breaks and code wrapping. Now go forth and continue your journey towards developer enlightenment...

Features!
───────────────
• Full Screen HTML + Widget Editor
• Disabled Line Breaks/ Code Wrapping
• Distraction Free Development
• 50+ Themes to choose from
• Duplicate Windows
• Peace & Enlightenment 


How To!
───────────────
1. Install extension
2. Login to your SparkPay Admin
3. Note the cool new green button
4. Click the button!


Links!
───────────────
• Github: github.com/oneezy/sparkpay-zen
• Website: oneezy.com
• SparkPay: sparkpay.com
